text.text_translated: An **asteroid** is a rock that flies through space. One way to protect Earth from an asteroid is to make it explode with a nuclear bomb. This idea might seem like a story from a film, and it was even in the 1998 film 'Armageddon'. However, NASA has a real plan for this. It is called HAMMER. HAMMER is a NASA plan to deal with asteroids in an emergency. This plan uses eight-ton rockets, which would be sent towards an asteroid that is coming closer. The hope is that these rockets would push the asteroid and change its direction. But if the asteroid is too close to Earth, this plan would not work. In that case, the rockets would instead carry nuclear bombs to make it explode.
